title: The new Odyssey game mode is a raid type game mode where you beat "AI" enemies and a Boss Kayne.
body: So why is it listed in the "PVP" section and not the "CO-OP VS. AI" section of gametypes? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
the people you see try to rush through the hardest difficulty


.... it's pvp.
its an rgm and that in pvp, also if it was in co-op vs ai no one would find it, lastly I dont see why this is such a big problem you're like the 5th post ive seen talking about this
